## Random initialization

```{r, fig.height=3.8, fig.width=7, echo=FALSE}
idx <- c(1,2)
for(i in 1:(length(results)/2)){
  idx <- c(i*2 - 1, i*2)
  ggd <- setup_ggplot_data(results[idx], experiment_jobs[idx,])
  ggd$scheme <- "tau=1"
  ggd$scheme[ggd$tau < 1] <- "tau=1/N"
  
  plt1 <- ggplot(data = ggd, aes(x = iteration, y = log_post, color = scheme)) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = -545.5614, lty = "dotted") + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = -648.1314, lty = "dotted") +  
    geom_hline(yintercept = -676.8834, lty = "dotted") +    
    geom_hline(yintercept = -703.6333, lty = "dotted") +    
    geom_line() + #  + ylim(-800, -500) 
    ggtitle(paste0("Seed: ", ggd$seed[1]))
  
  
  plt2 <- ggplot(data = ggd, aes(x = iteration, y = log_post, color = scheme)) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = -545.5614, lty = "dotted") + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = -648.1314, lty = "dotted") +  
    geom_hline(yintercept = -676.8834, lty = "dotted") +    
    geom_hline(yintercept = -703.6333, lty = "dotted") +    
    geom_line() + ylim(-800, -500)
  suppressWarnings(print(plt1))
  suppressWarnings(print(plt2))
}

```
